lyrics:
2 contributorscanâ€™t live without you lyricsverse 1 pleasure p
its four oclock in the mornin
and she aint feelin right
im on a first class trip
through this place called life
i dont know what to do
cause my bodys still shakin
i know its time to man up
and start my education
i need someone to call on
so i called on my best friend
i said bro i cant take it
he said boy stop trippin
so i hung up the phone
packed my shit and got right
i know what i gotta do now
be a man and face life

chorus pleasure p
maybe we could work it out
cause you know i cant live without you
and every time i think about it
i know a nigga cant live without you
aint no need to cry about it
cause you know i cant live without you ohohohohoh
i even wrote a song about it
cause you know i cant live without you
you might also likeverse 2 spectacular  pleasure
at the beginnin you was gone i was stayin with my mama mama damn
i stayed gettin in trouble man straight damn drama straight damn drama
i started dancin so i stay outta trouble trouble
cause i stayed in school sellin candy so my money doubled lets get this money
but then you told me man dancin was for punks
then you told me come and stay and you aint care what i want you aint care what i want bet that up
you told me come and dance and rap with my brothers for sure
you taught me how to love and how to care for my brothers i love yall boys
and then you taught me all your hustlin skills hustlin skills
just in case i get alone i know how to pay bills we millionaires
you told me i was straight regardless of a deal
and i love you man for that cause you always kept it real always kept it real ohohohohoh

cause you know i cant live without you
and every time i think about it

aint no need to cry about it

i even wrote a song about it yeah i wrote a song about it
cause you know i cant live without you im finna make you cry right now i cant live without you

verse 3 slickem  pleasure p
now that i made it it feel real good real good take you out the hood
put you on billionaire block in the middle of the woods in the middle of the woods
and as hard as it seemed you was there for me
one bedroom apartment on sixoh and fourteen them efficiencies down in cloverly
told you i had a dream and even though i like to cheat
im gonna love my georgia peach and thats a promise im gon keep her
to the end never gon bend and i can hear you tellin your friends
and i cant see you on the bus start flossin with your brand new benz ohohohohoh
in the world baby its yours id give you the world
cause you not no ordinary girl girl im your son and you my ol girl girl
my momma we share for 19 years
and from the bottom of my foundation im tellin you how i feel and i love ya ohohohohoh

see i fell in love with ya in love with ya wanna raise my kids with ya my kids with ya
but you left me all along with tears drippin down the picture
i remember the day like yesterday may 9th to be exact
id do anything to get you back even though i know you aint coming back
im serious as a heart attack could we get it back the way it was
cause i know you had some outside influences that pulled the plug
the reality junebug girl i know well always be together
i got you locked away deep in my heart always here forever ohohohohohoh
